Text: Is this real? Can anyone confirm this? Kinda strange that it's from Anonymous but on the front page he has a skull. And this isn't supposed to be out for a week I think.
And even with "Two backup stories", 82 megs is a bit large. Am I over thinking this one?

RMaynard the torrent's real. amazing 700 -- which is a 100-page issue -- shipped to comic shops today with instructions not to sell until 12/26. (same thing for avenging 15.1!)

anyway info + photographs started showing up days ago, followed by the scans! as for the file size, no offense to scanbro but i don't know if he's experienced (never heard of him before this). it's completely readable though.
Nevermind file size, Scanbro needs to learn how to SCAN.  I appreciate the effort he made, but his shit is too blurry to bother with.

It is NOT too blurry to read, if you think it is then you may need new bi-focals.

This scan is absolutely fine. I'm sure there will be better scans in the coming days, but this one is just fine.

Thanks for the upload!
